name: Nature Rangers Wilderness Programs

data_hints.pricing_location: Camp page lists holiday camp prices. Thanksgiving: $160 (2 days), Winter: $312 (4 days), MLK: $80 (1 day), President's: $160 (2 days), Spring Break: $390 (5 days)
data_hints.hours_location: All camps 9am-2pm with optional 2 hour aftercare
data_hints.sessions: Summer 2026 opens February 1st. Holiday camps currently open for registration.
data_hints.ages: TK-3rd Grade (Young Explorers), 4th-6th Grade (Young Naturalists - Summer Only)

young_explorers.focus: Curiosity and foundational social-emotional skills through play-based nature immersion
young_explorers.activities: Hands-on science, nature-based arts and crafts, guided games, child-led exploration

young_naturalists.activities: Group problem-solving, nature quests, Socratic discussions, mentoring younger Explorers

faq_topics: What does a typical day look like?
Can I request kids being together?
What are your student to staff ratios?
What are your wilderness safety protocols?
What are your water safety protocols?
What types of nature activities do you do?
Does my child have to participate in every activity?
What should my child wear and bring?
What if I am late to dropoff or pickup?
special_notes: Site type: Nonprofit 501(c)(3). WordPress site with modern design and embedded YouTube videos. Focus on outdoor education, resilience, and nature connection. Low staff ratios (6:1 for young explorers). Summer 2026 registration opens February 1st. Currently accepting holiday/school break camp registrations. Offers after-school and homeschool programs year-round. Strong emphasis on mental wellness and screen-free outdoor time. Young Naturalists (older kids) program is summer-only.
scraping_challenges: Registration forms likely on external platform
Some pages may require navigation through hub pages
mission_statement: Nature Rangers equips children to face challenges, embrace uncertainty, and connect deeply with nature through FUN games, play, and hands-on scientific discovery.
